about_the_game:
Investigate. Face the horror. Survive.

You play a witch hunter, a member of an ancient order charged with tracking down and exorcising the evil forces that haunt our world. In this narrative, procedural adventure, each mission confronts you with supernatural puzzles, moral choices and nightmarish creatures.

Key features

🕵️ An immersive narrative RPG - Each investigation plunges you into a unique story, influenced by your choices and actions.

👁️ Investigation and exploration - Search abandoned corners, interview witnesses and gather clues to understand the lurking menace.

🎲 A paper-based role-playing system - Roll dice for your actions, use your skills and adapt your strategy to each situation.

🕰️ Procedural storytelling - With each new game, the story evolves with new events, clues and twists.

👹 Face the forces of evil - Banish demonic entities in turn-based combat, where every decision can seal your fate.

🛠️ Customization and progression - Select a character, improve your skills and adapt your playing style.

A dark and oppressive universe

Immerse yourself in a world where superstition hides frightening truths. Each mission takes you to a place steeped in mystery and terror:

🏚️ Haunted mansions where shadows whisper forbidden secrets.
🏭 Disused factories where ancient rituals have left indelible scars.
🌲 Isolated villages where the inhabitants hide disturbing truths.
🌊 Misty bayous where spirits prowl in search of vengeance.
🏰 The castle of evil where your adventure ends depending on the path you take.

Will you dare to confront the invisible?

Every choice has consequences. Every mistake can cost you your life. Only your intuition and your mastery of the occult arts will allow you to survive... or sink into madness.
